Flashlight App: Create a mobile app that turns your phone into a flashlight. The app would allow users to turn on the flashlight, adjust the brightness, and even change the color of the light. It could also include features like a strobe light, SOS mode, and a compass.

Smart Flashlight: Develop a flashlight that can be controlled remotely using a smartwatch or voice commands. It could also have sensors that detect motion and turn on the flashlight automatically when needed.

Solar-Powered Flashlight: Create a flashlight that can be charged using solar power. It could be useful for outdoor activities, camping, and emergency situations where traditional power sources are not available.
Augmented Reality Flashlight: Develop a flashlight that projects augmented reality images onto the surrounding environment. It could be used for navigation, entertainment, and educational purposes.

Smart Flashlight with Voice Recognition: Create a flashlight that can recognize different voices and respond accordingly. For example, it could turn on and off based on voice commands, or it could play music or audio messages when triggered.
